Container.Name: docspell-joex
Container.Overview:
Docspell is a personal document organizer (https://github.com/eikek/docspell).
Part 3: Docspell-JOEX
Docspell needs a set of images to run: 1. solr and a database (install a solr and database image of your choice) 2. docspell-consumedir 3. docspell-joex 4. docspell-restserver
JOEX is short for Job Executor and it is the component managing long running tasks in docspell. One of these long running tasks is the file processing task. The rest server and the job executor can be started multiple times in order to scale out. It must be ensured, that all connect to the same database.
Container.Description:
Docspell is a personal document organizer (https://github.com/eikek/docspell).
Part 3: Docspell-JOEX
Docspell needs a set of images to run: 1. solr and a database (install a solr and database image of your choice) 2. docspell-consumedir 3. docspell-joex 4. docspell-restserver
JOEX is short for Job Executor and it is the component managing long running tasks in docspell. One of these long running tasks is the file processing task. The rest server and the job executor can be started multiple times in order to scale out. It must be ensured, that all connect to the same database.

Config.Name: DOCSPELL_HEADER_VALUE
Config.Description: DOCSPELL_HEADER_VALUE=SomeRandomString defines a secret that is shared between some containers. Please see the consumedir.sh docs for additional info.

Config.Name: DB_TYPE
Config.Description: DB_TYPE=postgresql type of database to use (postgresql, mariadb, h2) You need an allready running database server!

Config.Name: DB_NAME
Config.Description: DB_NAME=dbname database name database will be created at first run
